title: Pitch Deck: Nexus: The AI-Powered Knowledge Companion for Content Creators

sections.title: Intro
sections.subtitle: Nexus: Your AI-Powered Knowledge Companion
sections.content: Real-time intelligence and deep research capabilities for journalists, live streamers, and all knowledge-based creators.

sections.title: The Problem
sections.subtitle: Knowledge creators face a fragmented and inefficient workflow:

subsections.subtitle: For Live Streamers: Information Recall Overload
subsections.content: Juggling vast amounts of personal content (people, events, stories) while maintaining audience engagement is incredibly difficult, leading to missed opportunities and broken flow.

subsections.subtitle: For Journalists & Researchers: Disconnected Data
subsections.content: Sifting through disparate pieces of information—people, events, timelines—and connecting the dots is a manual, inefficient process. Traditional tools fail to uncover the hidden story.

subsections.subtitle: For All Creators: Cognitive Strain & Manual Effort
subsections.content: Constantly searching for facts, dates, or names—whether live on-air or during research—wastes time, breaks creative flow, and limits the depth of the content produced.

sections.title: The Solution
sections.subtitle: Nexus: A unified platform for knowledge management, research, and real-time recall.
sections.content: Nexus is an intelligent co-pilot that helps you build a personal knowledge graph and leverage it seamlessly. It combines a powerful research webapp with a real-time content companion.

subsections.subtitle: Centralized Knowledge Hub:
subsections.content: Organize your research—people, events, locations, stories, and sources—into a connected, intelligent library.

subsections.subtitle: Powerful Research & Querying:
subsections.content: Go beyond keyword search. Ask complex questions across your entire knowledge base to uncover hidden connections and insights instantly.

subsections.subtitle: Live AI Co-Pilot:
subsections.content: During live streams or presentations, our app listens and provides real-time, context-aware information and prompts directly on your screen.

subsections.subtitle: Data Visualization:
subsections.content: Instantly see complex relationships with dynamic graphs and network visualizations, making your story clear.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.subtitle: From Deep Research to Live Performance
sections.content: [Visual representation of the unified creator workflow]

subsections.subtitle: 1. Build Your Knowledge Graph:
subsections.content: Easily add and link entities: people, events, locations, and source materials. Nexus intelligently organizes the data in the background.

subsections.subtitle: 2. Research & Uncover Insights (The Chronicle Hub):
subsections.content: Use our webapp to run complex queries like, 'Show all people present at Event X near Location Y in the last 6 months.' Results are returned instantly and can be visualized as a network graph.

subsections.subtitle: 3. Go Live with Confidence (The Elevate Co-Pilot):
subsections.content: While streaming, our app captures your audio. As you speak, relevant hints from your knowledge graph (calendar entries, maps, contact info, story points) appear on your screen.

subsections.subtitle: 4. The Engine: Robust Architecture
subsections.content: Our system uses CQRS and Polyglot Persistence to ensure queries are blazingly fast and data integrity is always maintained, giving you the best of speed and reliability.

sections.title: Core Technology: The Unified Knowledge Graph
sections.subtitle: Built on a modern, scalable, and robust architecture:
sections.content: Our unique approach to data management is what enables Nexus's powerful features.

subsections.subtitle: Polyglot Persistence:
subsections.content: We combine the strengths of SQL for structured data integrity (ACID compliance) and NoSQL for the flexibility needed to handle the evolving nature of creative research.

subsections.subtitle: Polymorphic Relationships:
subsections.content: A highly adaptable data model allows any piece of information (a note, a source) to be linked to any entity (a person, event, or location) without a complex structure, mirroring the way research actually works.

subsections.subtitle: CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation):
subsections.content: By separating the systems for writing data (Commands) and reading data (Queries), we ensure that complex searches don't slow down data entry. This results in a consistently fast and responsive user experience.

sections.title: Key Features & Benefits
sections.subtitle: The ultimate tool for knowledge-based creation:

subsections.subtitle: Uncover Hidden Stories:
subsections.content: Powerful querying and visualization tools help you find connections you would have otherwise missed.

subsections.subtitle: Enhance Professionalism:
subsections.content: Seamless real-time access to information eliminates awkward pauses and on-the-fly searches during live streams.

subsections.subtitle: Deeper Engagement:
subsections.content: Provide richer, more detailed, and accurate information to your audience, fostering deeper connections and authority.

subsections.subtitle: Intuitive & Collaborative:
subsections.content: A user-friendly interface with real-time collaboration features designed for creative teams.

subsections.subtitle: Reduced Cognitive Load:
subsections.content: Frees up your mental bandwidth to focus on storytelling, audience interaction, and creative flow.

subsections.subtitle: Time Savings:
subsections.content: Drastically reduces time spent on manual research, pre-stream memorization, and in-stream searching.

sections.title: Market Opportunity
sections.subtitle: Tapping into the entire Knowledge Creator Economy.

subsections.subtitle: Massive & Growing Market:
subsections.content: From the multi-billion dollar creator economy (YouTube, Twitch, Podcasting) to the fields of investigative journalism, academia, and education.

subsections.subtitle: Untapped Problem Space:
subsections.content: Current tools are siloed. They focus either on audience interaction (for streamers) or basic note-taking (for researchers). None unify the creator's personal knowledge base for both research and performance.

subsections.subtitle: Clear Value Proposition:
subsections.content: We solve a clear, identifiable pain subtitle for any serious creator whose content is built on a foundation of information.

sections.title: Business Model
sections.subtitle: A scalable SaaS model for individuals and teams.

subsections.subtitle: * Free Tier:
subsections.content: Basic knowledge graph management and a limited number of queries and live-assist events per month.

subsections.subtitle: * Premium Subscription (Per User):
subsections.content: Unlocks unlimited library size, advanced querying, data visualization, and full live co-pilot functionality.

subsections.subtitle: * Teams/Enterprise Tier:
subsections.content: Adds collaboration features, shared projects, advanced security, and administrative controls.

subsections.subtitle: Target Customers:
subsections.content: Investigative journalists, data journalists, YouTubers, podcasters, educators, and public speakers.

sections.title: Milestones & Vision
sections.subtitle: Our roadmap to becoming the essential tool for knowledge creators.

subsections.subtitle: Phase 1 (MVP):
subsections.content: Launch the core research webapp with knowledge graph creation and powerful querying. Beta release of the live co-pilot for early adopters.

subsections.subtitle: Phase 2:
subsections.content: Introduce advanced data visualization tools, team collaboration features, and deeper integration with streaming software (e.g., OBS).

subsections.subtitle: Phase 3:
subsections.content: Integrate with external data APIs (public records, news archives). Introduce ML/AI features for suggestive linking and automated entity extraction.

subsections.subtitle: Long-term Vision:
subsections.content: To become the indispensable AI-powered operating system for knowledge creation, revolutionizing how creators research, connect, and present information.
